name: DescribeLayoutSection

fields.name: collapsed
fields.description: The current view of the record details section: collapsed (true) or expanded (false).

fields.name: layoutsectionid
fields.description: The unique ID of the record details section in the layout.

methods.name: getColumns
methods.description: Returns the number of columns in the QuickAction.DescribeLayoutSection.

methods.name: getHeading
methods.description: The heading text (label) for the QuickAction.DescribeLayoutSection.

methods.name: getLayoutRows
methods.description: Returns an array of one or more QuickAction.DescribeLayoutRow objects.

methods.name: getLayoutSectionId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the record details section in the layout.

methods.name: getParentLayoutId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the layout upon which this DescribeLayoutSection resides.

methods.name: getRows
methods.description: Returns the number of rows in the QuickAction.DescribeLayoutSection.

methods.name: isCollapsed
methods.description: Indicates whether the record details section is collapsed (true) or expanded (false). If you build your own app, you can use this method to see whether the current user collapsed a section, and respect that preference in your own UI.

methods.name: isUseCollapsibleSection
methods.description: Indicates whether the QuickAction.DescribeLayoutSection is a collapsible section (true) or not (false).

methods.name: isUseHeading
methods.description: Indicates whether to use the heading (true) or not (false).

description: Represents a section of a layout and consists of one or more columns and one or more rows (an array of QuickAction.DescribeLayoutRow).
